text: Fathom is a 1967 British American action spy comedy movie directed by Leslie H. Martinson and was based on the unfinished novel by Larry Forrester. It stars Raquel Welch, Anthony Franciosa, Ronald Fraser, Richard Briers, Greta Chi, Ann Lancaster and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 comedy movies Category:1967 action movies Category:1960s spy movies Category:British action movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Leslie H. Martinson Category:Movies set in Spain
title: Fathom (movie)
